content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location and the apartment's features, I believe the standard market rate should be reduced to consider my situation as a student. Could we negotiate a lower price, say around 700 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you proposed is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are interested in the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position better now, I am willing to increase my offer while still being reasonable for a student budget. Could we discuss a rental price of 850 Euros per month for this apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you proposed is still too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are interested in the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In light of your expectations, I acknowledge the challenge in meeting them as a student with financial limitations. However, I am able to raise my offer a bit more. How about considering 900 Euros per month for renting this apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you proposed is still too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are interested in the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a student, my budget is stretched to its limit with the previous offer of 900 Euros. Unfortunately, I cannot go beyond that while still being able to afford the rent. If this price doesn't align with your expectations, I understand we may not be able to reach an agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [950] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
